aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Arial,Bold;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\fs20 We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of "bodily injury" or property damage" to which this insurance applies. We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking those damages. However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking damages for "bodily\par injury" or "property damage" to which this insurance does not apply. We may, at our discretion, investigate any occurrence" and settle any claim or "suit" that may result.\par \par This insurance applies to "bodily injury" and "property damage" only if:\par \cf1\b a\cf0\b0 .The "bodily injury" or "property damage" is caused by an "occurrence" that takes place in the "coverage territory";\par \b\f1 b.\b0\f0 The "bodily injury" or "property damage"occurs during the policy period\par \par \b\f1 Exclusions\b0\f0\par This insurance does not apply to:\par \b\f1 a. Expected or Intended Injury\par \b0\f0 "Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.\par This exclusion does not apply to "bodily injury" resulting from the use of reasonable force to protect persons or property.\par \b\f1 b. Pollution\par \b0\f0 "Bodily injury" or "property damage" arising out of the actual, alleged or threatened discharge, dispersal, seepage, migration,\par release or escape of "pollutants":\cf1\f2\fs16\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Apartment Building-Premises/Operations Liability Form
